column3:
Joey felt the very first rain drop hit his hat.
ewline
ewline"Let's go inside!" he said to his friend Billy.
ewline
ewlineThe two ran inside the house as it began to rain more outside. Joey's mother was very happy that they missed the rain and got inside before it made a big mess. Joey and Billy weren't as happy.
ewline
ewline"What are we going to do in here all day?" asked Billy.
ewline
ewline"I don't know" said Joey, looking out the window as the rain came down.
ewline
ewlineHarder. And harder.
ewline
ewline"Oh no! I left my baseball glove outside" said Joey as he watched it begin to fill up with rain. His glove was going to be a mess!
ewline
ewlineThankfully, Joey's dad pulled up in his car. Seeing the glove on the ground, he picked it up as he ran inside.
ewline
ewline"Careful sport, you almost lost this" he told his son as he tossed him the wet mitt. But Joey wasn't listening, he was looking past his dad as he walked through the door. The sky was clearing up! Joey ran outside, Billy came after him.
ewline
ewline"Look at that!" Billy said as he pointed at the sky. A rainbow was appearing, it was so beautiful! The rain wasn't bad after all!
column9: multiple: What was Joey upset about?
column11: Joey's mom didn't give him a snack
column12: He left his baseball glove outside
column14: multiple: How did Joey and Billy see the rainbow?
column15: Joey saw the sky clearing up behind his dad and they ran outside
column16: Joey's mom showed them one on TV
column17: One was drawn on the baseball glove
column18: They saw it through the window
column19: one: What made the boys come inside?
column23: Joey's mom made them come inside
